name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程以當代文學批評和文化理論為基礎，探討小說與戲劇改編成電影的過程中，文字轉化成視覺意象之間的差異，期能提升多元化的思辯及表達能力。
schedule:
This course is oriented to create a film with the total involvement of the participants. The course is designed to facilitate the production as well as the necessary knowledge of film art. By understanding the elements of cinema through lectures and workshops, students are exposed to both theoretical understanding of film criticism and the production of one. Upon completion of the course, participants should have a basic understanding of the elements of cinema, how they are related to the aesthetics of cinema, and how to transform their own life experiences into the creative process of a film production.
